title: JBPs Quality Tweet, To Incarnate or Not? Fumbling with The Ultimate
description:
#john_veraeke #jonathan_pageau #paul_vander_klay #moq

Always happy when JBP and Pirsig cross, I'm learning about NeoPlatonism, introduced to me by John Vervaeke and how it's making pieces of the puzzle fit. As alway, heavy MoQ lens
